name: EditorMusic
description: music in your editor, what's not to like?

skip-song.name: Show next song button in editor

prev-song.name: Show previous song button in editor

low-pass.name: Enable low-pass filter
low-pass.description: Enable or disable the low-pass filter that makes the sound "muffled" when you go deeper into menus.

unnamed-song-fallback.name: Use filename for unnamed songs
unnamed-song-fallback.description: If this is enabled, it uses the file name for unnamed songs instead of your preference.

extra-songs-path.name: Extra songs path (req. restart)
extra-songs-path.description: If this is set to a path, EditorMusic will take songs from here as well as the config folder.

unsupported-characters-fallback.name: Unsupported character fallback
unsupported-characters-fallback.description: Unsupported characters are replaced by this chosen character. Set to blank to just remove the character.
